participant_1.name: Chist
participant_1.personality: Introverted and contemplative, often feeling down about life's circumstances.
participant_1.background: I'm overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I do not believe in God. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and outgoing, enjoys sharing her interests and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is red. I am a Christian. My sister is a pole dancer. I enjoy listening to classical music. I can drive a tractor.

content.text: hi, how are you today? i am doing well.
how many kids do you have? i've two.
what do you do for a living? i work on facebook.
that is pretty cool. what are you doing there?
